Record short volatility futures positioning creating squeeze potential
Technical deterioration in bellwethers (AAPL losing 100-day MA, TSLA weakness)
Governance token value capture uncertainty as institutions may circumvent token models
Policy announcement volatility creating sharp intraday swings
